import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; function Trending() { const [animes, setAnimes] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { axios.get("http://localhost:8000/api/animes").then((response) => { setAnimes(response.data.data); }); }, []); return (
